name: KeltnerChannel
description: Volatility envelope around an EMA using ATR-based bands. Plots upper, middle (EMA), and lower channel lines for breakout and mean-reversion trading.

ema_period.description: Period of the Exponential Moving Average (middle line)

atr_period.description: Period of the Average True Range used for band width

atr_factor.description: ATR multiplier controlling band distance from the EMA

width.description: Channel width as percentage of middle line
